name: Dorbins of the Lavish Condenser
description: Stumbling into lost treasure, the Dorbins of the Lavish Condenser used the wealth well and quickly rose in stature to local royalty. They also capture moonlight in a moonlight condenser - old technology created by the Gibbun in order to distill moonlight for further processing. Now serving as guards-for-hire using their high-tech defensive equipment, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
